src:
Laga Kontra PSM Ditunda, Persebaya Belum Pikirkan Uji Coba
01 Nov 2019, 21:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya belum berencana menggelar uji coba untuk mengisi kekosongan jadwal pasca ditundanya laga kontra PSM Makassar. Sebab, masih banyak hal yang belum dipersiapkan.
Menurut pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso, untuk menggelar pertandingan uji coba, setidaknya dia harus latihan taktikal. Sementara, Persebaya baru akan menyiapkannya awal pekan depan.
"Nanti kami lihat dulu, kalau ujicoba saya harus melakukan taktikal dulu," kata Aji Santoso, Jumat (31/11/2019).
Laga Persebaya kontra PSM Makassar ditunda menyusul tidak adanya kejelasan terkait status pertandingan. Meskipun manajemen Green Force sudah menyiapkan Stadion Batakan, Balikpapan sebagai venue.
Bahkan, PSSI maupun operator liga saling lempar tanggung jawab dalam merespon surat keberatan yang dilayangkan PSM Makassar.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
PSM Counter Match Postponed, Persebaya Not Thinking about Trial
Nov 1 2019, 21:43 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya has no plans yet to hold a trial to fill the schedule vacuum after the postponement of the PSM Makassar match. Because, there are still many things that have not been prepared.
According to Persebaya coach, Aji Santoso, to hold a trial match, at least he must practice tactics. Meanwhile, Persebaya will only prepare it early next week.
"Later we will see, if the trial I have to do a tactical first," said Aji Santoso, Friday (11/31/2019).
The Persebaya match against Makassar PSM was postponed following a lack of clarity regarding the status of the match. Although the management of Green Force has prepared the Batakan Stadium, Balikpapan as a venue.
In fact, PSSI and league operators are throwing responsibility in responding to objections issued by PSM Makassar.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
